articles.content: Epic Games Store's next free game is a big one: Epic has confirmed Grand Theft Auto V - Premium Edition is the next free game available to claim and keep. GTA V is free now until Thursday, May 21, at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET, when it'll be replaced by next week's f… [+3372 chars]

articles.author: John Davidson
articles.title: Dodgy Huawei hacks aren't what they used to be - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: Huawei might make the world's best phones, but until the Google ban is lifted, we're going to have to make do with lesser brands.
articles.content:
How hard could it be, we figured? Getting GMS onto the Mate 30 Pro was a breeze (it was so easy, in fact, that many outsiders suspect Huawei was somehow involved in the unofficial hack), and getting it onto the Mate Xs should be just as simple, right?
Wrong.… [+1961 chars]
